scripts.allure:report: npm run clear:allure:report && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.cy:regression: npm run clear:allure:results && npm run regression:e2e && npm run trigger:allure
scripts.syregression:e2e: npx synpress run -cf synpress.config.js run --env allure=true --browser electron --spec ./cypress/e2e/*.cy.js
scripts.sy:regression: npm run clear:allure:results && npm run syregression:e2e && npm run trigger:allure
